title: 2 BR/2BA Brand New Home For Rent In Senior Community (Ages 55 yrs+)
posting_body: ['This beautiful brand new (never lived in) 2 bedroom/2 bath manufactured home located in the charming city of Petaluma, a gateway to Sonoma’s Wine Country.', 'Photos of the interior and exterior of the home will be posted soon.', 'Amenities of this pristine senior community (ages 55 years & up) include the following:', '\uf0d8 Totally remodeled clubhouse', '\uf0d8', 'New pool & spa located adjacent to a beautifully landscaped patio and barbecue area', '\uf0d8', 'Onsite laundry facilities', '\uf0d8 Remodeled library and game room with a pool table', '\uf0d8', 'New Fitness gym', '\uf0d8', 'Bocce Ball Court', '\uf0d8 Lushly landscaped greenbelts', "This brand new home built in 2022 features a bright and open floor plan, 9' ceilings, 2 bedrooms /2baths, wood laminate floors, granite counters, stainless steel appliances, washer/dryer hook-ups—landscaped yard.", 'Lovely front porch to sit outside and relax in the evenings.', 'For more information, call Kathy, our onsite manager at', 'show contact info', '.', 'This home is located at 4 Oakwood Dr. and is available for rent as of August 1st, at $2,995/month, plus utilities.', 'Deposit $2,995 (12-month lease).', 'Feel free to visit our website <URL>']
